H0.text: Who composed the music known as The Nutcracker Suite, for the Christmas themed ballet The Nutcracker, premiered in St Petersburg, 1892. Pyotr Ilyich Glinka

H1.text: Who composed the music known as The Nutcracker Suite, for the Christmas themed ballet The Nutcracker, premiered in St Petersburg, 1892. Antonín Dvořák

H2.text: Who composed the music known as The Nutcracker Suite, for the Christmas themed ballet The Nutcracker, premiered in St Petersburg, 1892. Johann Strauss II

H3.text: Who composed the music known as The Nutcracker Suite, for the Christmas themed ballet The Nutcracker, premiered in St Petersburg, 1892. Tchicovski

A4.text: The Nutcracker Suite was composed by Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky.

A5.text: The Nutcracker Suite was first performed under the composer's direction on 19 March 1892.
